channel.title: Sure Shot on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sure Shot on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: This Smart Basketball Tracks Data About Every Shot. It Could Be Headed to the NBA
item.description: The league is considering adopting the tech for in-game use. Since the sensor is in the valve stem, the ball dribbles, shoots, and rebounds nearly the same as always.
